rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room, featuring vibrant colors and eclectic decor.
Dining area integrated with the living space for a seamless flow.
Open kitchen designed with modern and vintage elements, featuring rustic finishes in keeping with bohemian aesthetic.
Primary bedroom with Vastu-compliant east or north orientation, abundant natural light, built-in closet, and a private balcony.
Secondary bedroom with bohemian decor, designed for relaxation and privacy, also Vastu-aligned.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed in the north as per Vastu recommendations, leading directly to an open living area.
Balconies accessible from both bedrooms and kitchen for fresh air and light.

rooms.description: A compact servant's bedroom that maintains privacy, built in a separate area of the penthouse.
An ensuite bathroom for servants' quarters, ensuring convenience and privacy.

openings.description: A dedicated service entrance to maintain separation between private living spaces and servant areas.
